controller.game

Class GameWindowControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.game.GameWindowControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameWindowController

    public final class GameWindowControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameWindowController
    An implementation for the GameWindowController interface.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(MovementDirection direction)
        Description copied from interface: GameWindowController
        It is called when the player triggers the movement event and it updates the model subsequently basing upon the game logics (the movement can result in a change or not).
        Specified by:
        move in interface GameWindowController
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the movement

      • restartCurrentLevel

        public void restartCurrentLevel()
        Description copied from interface: GameWindowController
        Restarts the current level. Every movement performed since the beginning of the level will be lost and every element will return to the original position.
        Specified by:
        restartCurrentLevel in interface GameWindowController

      • levelFinishedAccepted

        public void levelFinishedAccepted()
        Description copied from interface: GameWindowController
        Starts the next level. This is only called when a level is finished and there is another one next (after user accepted the corresponding message).
        Specified by:
        levelFinishedAccepted in interface GameWindowController

      • gameFinishedAccepted

        public void gameFinishedAccepted()
        Description copied from interface: GameWindowController
        Goes back to the initial view. This is only called when the last level of a sequence is finished (after user accepted the corresponding message).
        Specified by:
        gameFinishedAccepted in interface GameWindowController

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(java.lang.String path)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: GameWindowController
        Saves the current game. More specifically, it creates a new level sequence with the current level in its current state as a first level and all the ordered remaining levels next to it.
        Specified by:
        saveGame in interface GameWindowController
        Parameters:
        path - the absolute path of the file to be saved
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception occurred.

      • backToInitialView

        public void backToInitialView()
        Description copied from interface: GameWindowController
        Goes back to initial view.
        Specified by:
        backToInitialView in interface GameWindowController
